text: Snehadooth is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film, directed by D Madhu, starring Sarath Haridas and Madhupal in the lead role. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/gallery_snehadooth.htm ==Cast== * Sukumari *Karthika Kannan * Madhupal * Beena Antony * Kannur Sreelatha * MR Gopakumar * Mala Aravindan * Sarath Haridas * Seetha * Yoonus ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Snehadooth
